goal.ch: 本課程結合崑曲博物館策展實務，從一個展覽的發想與討論開始，讓學生透過策展之規劃與執行，實際參與策展過程。課程將邀請不同專業講者，包括：1、策展的概念與方法；2、學習傳統表演藝術文物中，屬於「表演藝術」與「工藝」等不同層面的知識；3、文物保存與修復的基本概念；4、文化資產的活化。學生也將在課程中，分組參與崑曲博物館的策展工作。
goal.en: This course combines the curatorial practice of the Kunqu Opera Museum, starting from the idea and discussion of an exhibition, allowing students to actually participate in the curatorial process through the planning and execution of the exhibition. The course will invite speakers from different professions, including: 1. Concepts and methods of curating; 2. Learning about different aspects of knowledge such as “performing art“ and “craft“ in traditional performing arts cultural relics; 3. The aspects of preservation and restoration of cultural relics Basic concepts; 4. Activation of cultural assets. Students will also participate in the curatorial work of the Kunqu Opera Museum in groups during the course.

outline.ch: 單元一：傳統表演藝術的基本知識（第一週、第二週）單元二：發想、研究與策劃：一個展覽的開始（第三週、第四週）單元三：從文字到展場：文學作品的立體化展示（第五週、第六週、第七週，預計邀請臺灣文學館策展人王嘉玲課堂演講）期中報告：觀展分享（第八週或第九週）單元四：傳統表演藝術的文物（一）：曲本、書畫與紙質文物（第九週、第十週、第十一週，預計結合崑曲博物館工作坊，邀請崑曲博物館館長洪惟助教授、藝流文物維護工作室負責人陳宜柳課堂演講）單元五：傳統表演藝術的文物（二）：戲服與繡品（第十二週、第十三週、第十四週，預計結合崑曲博物館工作坊，邀請臺南藝術大學黃翠梅教授、刺繡工藝師粘碧華舉辦工作坊）單元六：展場文案撰寫、視覺設計與導覽規劃（第十五週、第十六週，預計邀請策展人李奇鴻課堂演講）單元七：傳統表演與當代藝術的跨領域想像（第十七週）單元八：期末分享（第十八週）
outline.en: Unit 1: Basic knowledge of traditional performing arts (weeks 1 and 2) Unit 2: Ideation, research and planning: the beginning of an exhibition (weeks 3 and 4) Unit 3: From text to exhibition venue: Three-dimensional display of literary works (weeks 5, 6, and 7, it is expected to invite the curator of the Taiwan Literature Museum, Wang Jialing, to give a lecture) Mid-term report: Exhibition sharing (week 8 or 9) Unit 4: Tradition Cultural relics of performing arts (1): opera scripts, calligraphy and painting, and paper cultural relics (in the ninth, tenth, and eleventh weeks, it is expected to be combined with the Kun Opera Museum workshop and invite Assistant Professor Hong Wei, Director of the Kun Opera Museum, and Yiliu Cultural Relics Maintenance Classroom speech by studio director Chen Yiliu) Unit 5: Cultural Relics of Traditional Performing Arts (2): Costumes and Embroidery (Weeks 12, 13, and 14, it is expected to be combined with the Kunqu Opera Museum workshop to invite Tainan Professor Huang Cuimei from the University of the Arts and embroidery craftsman Nian Bihua held a workshop) Unit 6: Exhibition copywriting, visual design and navigation planning (in the 15th and 16th weeks, curator Li Qihong is expected to give a classroom lecture) Seven: Interdisciplinary imagination of traditional performance and contemporary art (week 17) Unit 8: Final sharing (week 18)
